site.description: DCR is a Cargo-style tool for C/C++ projects. Rust implementation, cross-platform support, and self-update via GitHub Releases.

hero.title: DCR - Dexoron Cargo Realization
hero.description: DCR is a Cargo-style utility for C/C++ projects. The current implementation is written in Rust, supports Linux, macOS, and Windows, and uses a single configuration file: dcr.toml.

commands.title: Commands
commands.intro: Below are the basic commands. All available commands can be found in the documentation.

rows.new: Creates a project named hello in the current directory
rows.init: Creates a project in the current directory using the directory name
rows.build: Builds the project. If no profile is specified, --debug is used.
rows.run: Builds and runs the binary. If no profile is specified, --debug is used.
rows.clean: Removes a build profile from target. If no profile is specified, removes the entire folder.
rows.update: Updates DCR to the latest version from GitHub Releases.
